subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Manny Legace stopped 24 shots and Jamal Mayers scored two goals to lead the host St. Louis Blues to a 3-0 victory over the Calgary Flames last night.
snippet: Manny Legace stopped 24 shots and Jamal Mayers scored two goals to lead the host St. Louis Blues to a 3-0 victory over the Calgary Flames last night.
